title: IC Fabrication
description: Introduction to microelectronic processing technologies and CMOS. Includes a laboratory for fabrication/testing of MOS transistors, basic CMOS circuits, integrated resistors and capacitors. Credit will not be awarded for ECE 4452 and ECE 4752.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ECE 3030 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and ECE 2031 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
